summary: This mod overhauls the lighting of the new buildings added by Cutting Room Floor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][/size][/center][center][size=4]For users of Cutting Room Floor by [color=#ff0000][size=6][b]Arthmoor[/b][/size][/color][/size]


[size=4]Jen's Farmhouse[/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/QoY4Ebg.gif[/img]

[size=4]Frost River Meadery[/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/U6IqNeK.gif[/img]


[size=4]Traillus' House[/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Dwfxfvj.gif[/img]

These 3 gifs are just examples. I overhauled every new cell added by Cutting Room Floor.
[color=#ff0000][size=6]
REQUIREMENTS[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47327/?]Cutting Room Floor
[/url]
[color=#ff0000][size=4]Compatibility[/size][/color]
Compatible with all mods that doesn't touch the lights added by Cutting Room Floor.

[color=#ff0000][size=4]Load Order[/size][/color]
Place 'CRF - Lighting Overhaul.esp' AFTER 'Cutting Room Floor.esp' but BEFORE 'No Snow Under The Roof - CRF Patch.esp' if you use it.

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Recommendation[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url]


If you're a user of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51188/?]No Snow Under the Roof[/url], you might need this.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62120/?]Cutting Room Floor - No Snow Under the Roof[/url][/center]
author: SkyrimFantom
